com.magknight.route.manager

Class RouteManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magknight.route.manager.RouteManager

  • public class RouteManager
extends java.lang.Object
    RouteManager class controls all active routes in the FMS. currently has support for 2 routes as per real 787 FMC specifications. Provides methods to interface with routes.
    Since:
    5/19/2020
    Author:
    Omar Alam
    See Also:
    Route
